Articles.Content:
Hi, when I want to select some contracts where says Build a space station and send it somewhere,  the discription says "Test test test test" or "Select a contract" with no more information. Also time when the contract expires shows a XX:XX:XX.. I can take it, but it's hard to cancel because sometimes button just unpressable. Then contract is canceled it takes some money and rep.

Spoiler

 

Edited January 7, 2019 by kridershot

Are you running any mods?

Do you have the game on Steam?  If so, there have been update issues with Steam with 1.6.  Try validating the game files.

I can confirm this bug still persist in 1.7.0. Right this type of contract: build a station. Not all station contracts affected, so this is related to contract requirements.

And one more thing - but very important: bug triggered only in non-english localization (i.e. Russian). Switching to English via Steam game properties allow to get contract specs, see example screenshot:

Spoiler
Does anyone know how to fix it without switching to English?

20 hours ago, Homster said:

Does anyone know how to fix it without switching to English?

Although this contract did not show properly in Mission Control, it seems all specs displayed correctly in contract list in-fly (right edge button). So, it is possible to save game, get contract, jump to any ship and check contract specs, make a decision. However, this way you did not know contract complete bonuses.

I know it, but I need to know all bonuses of this mission, because I play at 50% income, so I must calculate possible profit)

Anyway, thank you)

Can you narrow it down to a requirement? I downloaded the Russian localization file and ... well I don't speak Russian so I have no clue what I'm looking at. But I wonder if you compare the English file to the Russian file, we could possibly pinpoint the line causing the problem. I suspect maybe a weird character, but when I look at the file ALL of the characters look weird
